item.title: LU
item.description: score:-11 Chances: Lufax Holding Ltd. has been a leading financial services enabler for small business owners in China, with a technology-empowered personal financial services platform. The company has announced unaudited financial results for the fourth quarter and full year, showing potential growth and stability in the market.
